MEMORANDUM FOR MESSRS. DAVIS and MARQUIS
Subject: FCC Notice of Proposed Rule Making, in
the matter of FREE OR REDUCED RATE
INTERCONNECTION SERVICE FOR NONCOMMERCIAL
EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTING, Docket No. 18316.
Enclosed is the memorandum you requested; it summarizes
the FCC Notice of Proposed Rule Making, suggests areas in
which comments might be helpful, and explains the format
and procedures- for filing.
